but now that the com- mander in chief addressed him he drew him- self up to such an extent that it seemed he could not have sustained it had the commander in chief continued to look at him, and so Ku- tuzov, who evidently understood his case and wished him nothing but good, quickly turned away, a scarcely perceptible smile flitting over his scarred and puffy face. 
"Another Ismail comrade/' said he. "A brave officer! Are you satisfied with him?" he asked the regimental commander.
